beans.description: == encryptDencryptPassword USAGE == define a bean to dencrypt/encrypt Password. <bean id="dencryptPassword" factory-bean="encryptDencryptPassword" factory-method="dencryptPassword"> <constructor-arg index="0" value="${jdbc.password}"/> <constructor-arg index="1" value="${rsa.key.private.base64}"/> </bean> PUBLIC KEY :MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQCpAVh977aPAnNSnhRvDtGLYjDHAoQu5sWzTC3TOms3xAdS3ffQJCA1HTMvDBjLHZTa2P3pdi1rtDre0xu/FpPAOdCqwXakdQw9KeV3KPx+diCm/vbhgEwWQXhVJ+PoIKPbNl8tURMjcgjdqm978dTf30RBtEm8fGNEvt8VAG2qhQIDAQAB PRIVATE KEY: hello world!:It7xDSQZ5R67ugTb/JFsTjqGaGtTX9sJ1NjTQaH4l1AQvWaIfVlGocGQ8OlfScdDjOxxU+C1Et6p+U3XrWk8vBbSC6rkyAU7BtRIeuvKM6Pf9Kica1TQlNEiSu5ZgtatqDLCsjd7cXngM1V4ehQMjxKtHc+TM2sq+/MW9jOYE+s= -- use -- <property name="password" ref="dencryptPassword" >
